profiledesc.creation: EAD 2002 Validated Finding Aid generated with the aid of a custom FileMaker Pro database developed by the staff of the Children's Literature Research Collections, University of Minnesota Libraries. Many thanks to all the staff and volunteers.11-3-05

did.head: Summary Information
did.repository: University of Minnesota Libraries Children's Literature Research Collections [clrc]
did.abstract: The collection contains illustrative material for 1 title, and includes original black and white illustrations and color separations.
did.physloc: See Detailed Descriptions for Each Title Item for Box Locations

descgrp.head: Important Information for Users of the Collections

accessrestrict.head: Access and Use:
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open for researchers with no restrictions. Registration with the collection is required.

userestrict.head: Copyright:
userestrict.p: This collection is protected by the Copyright Law of the United States (Title 17, U.S. Code). It is the user's responsibility to verify copyright ownership and to obtain all necessary permissions prior to the reproduction, publication, or other use of any portion of these materials.

scopecontent.p: The collection includes illustrative material for 1 title, consisting of original black and white illustrations and color separations.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The collection is indexed under the following headings in the catalog of the University of Minnesota Libraries. Researchers desiring materials about related topics, persons or places should search the catalog using these headings.

did.unittitle: original black and whilte title page illustration
